text: Cliff Burvill (26 March 1937 - 14 January 2021) was an Australian cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1956 Summer Olympics. He was born in Coffs Harbour, New South Wales. Burvill died on 14 January 2021 after a fall at a bicycle track in Byron Bay, New South Wales at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Australia Category:Australian cyclists Category:Sportspeople from New South Wales Category:Accidental deaths from falls
title: Cliff Burvill
